attributes.action: YES to multi-faith and multi-race, NO to multi-culturalism
attributes.additional_details:
Stop the drive for multi-culturalism and introduce policies to encourage Britishness. Enforce English as main language for all and prevent segregation.

Many people have no issue with multiple religous beliefs and are against any form of Racism, but want to retain Britishness and retain & value our Cultural uniqueness rather than be diluted by Multi-culturalism.
